name: amp-for-bandcamp
description: Enhances Bandcamp functionality with playback controls and UI improvements
author: Rafal Enden

scripts.build:zip: zip -r dist/bandcamp-tuned.zip manifest.json src/ vendor/ icons/
scripts.build:safari: xcodebuild -project "xcode/Bandcamp Tuned.xcodeproj" -scheme "Bandcamp Tuned (macOS)" -configuration Release -derivedDataPath dist/safari build
scripts.build: npm run build:zip && npm run build:safari
